contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.c8051f970dk.kit.si8051.c8051f970dk.demo.f97x_pca0_software_timer_blinky
contentItem.label: PCA0 Software Timer Blinky
contentItem.description:
Software Timer Example

This example project uses the PCA's Software Timer Mode to generate an
Interrupt that blinks LED05 at 5Hz.
